\pgfkeys{/pgf/number format/.cd,1000 sep={}}
\begin{tikzpicture}
    \begin{axis}[
        width=\linewidth,
        height=8cm,
        xmin=2005,
        xmax=2025, 
        %ylabel={Sonnenflecken im Mittel pro Monat},
        xlabel={Jahre},
        legend style={at={(0.02,0.98)},anchor=north west},
        legend cell align={left},
        legend entries={Sonnenflecken, Flux}
    ]
        \addplot[smooth, draw=DARCblue, thick] table [x=a, y=b, col sep=comma] {sunspots2.csv};
        \addplot[smooth, draw=DARCred, thick] table [x=a, y=b, col sep=comma] {flux.csv};
    \end{axis}
\end{tikzpicture}
